original: The patient, John Doe, was admitted to the cardiology unit on September 15, 2023, presenting symptoms of chest pain and shortness of breath. His medical history includes hypertension and hyperlipidemia. The patient, born on March 12, 1967, resides at 1234 Elm Street, Springfield, IL, 62704. During his stay, he was under the care of Dr. Emily Smith, who recommended a series of cardiac tests. Mr. Doe's discharge is scheduled for September 20, 2023. For follow-up appointments, he can be reached at (217) 555-0123 or via email at john.doe@example.com. His health insurance is identified by the beneficiary number 789-123-456.

original: Patient John Doe, a 64-year-old male, was admitted to our cardiology unit on July 12, 2023 for evaluation of chest pain. He resides at 123 Heart Lane, Cardiotown, TX, and can be contacted at (555) 123-4567. Upon admission, it was noted that his blood pressure was elevated, and he has a long-standing history of hypertension. His health plan beneficiary number is HPB123456789, and his cardiologist, Dr. Emily Smith, has prescribed adjustments to his medication. He is scheduled for discharge on July 15, 2023.
